game.name: Duo Heli Combat
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Helicopter action with local co-op and strategy elements! Fly, shoot, build, rescue, capture - solo or together with a friend in the split screen mode. Fun for everyone!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Helicopter action with local co-op and strategy elements! Fly, shoot, build, rescue, capture - solo or together with a friend in the split screen mode. Fun for everyone!
